'''Monetoo''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]].

They are functionally very similar to [[Seelie]]s, in that they need to be found and sometimes freed from various hazards, then accompanied back to their resting place, which if seen through [[Elemental Sight]] points in the direction of the creature.

==Hued Monetoo==
* Colors can be extracted from Hued Monetoo while [[Saurian Indwelling|indwelling]] a [[Saurian]], but can only be thrown when not indwelling.
* It is not possible to mix 3 Hued Monetoo.

==Locations==
An interactive map of Monetoo locations can be found on the [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=597 Teyvat Interactive Map].

There are currently 66 Monetoo throughout the land of Teyvat, all of which are in Natlan:

* For the {{Achievement|Monetoo Will Guide You Home (I)}}, follow '''8/16/32''' Monetoo and complete their graffiti in the [[Basin of Unnumbered Flames]], [[Tequemecan Valley]], [[Coatepec Mountain]], and [[Toyac Springs]] (max total is '''40''')
*For the {{Achievement|Monetoo Will Guide You Home (II)}}, follow '''3/6/10''' Monetoo back to their graffities on [[Quahuacan Cliff]] and [[Tezcatepetonco Range]] (max total is '''12''').
*For the {{Achievement|Votre Toast, Je Peux Vous Le Rendre}}, follow '''3/6/9''' Matador Monetoo back to their graffities on [[Atocpan]] and [[Ancient Sacred Mountain]]]] (max total is '''14''').

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*Monetoo, also spelled {{Lang|{{w|manitou}}|cr=ᒪᓂᑑ|cr_rm=manitō}} is the spiritual and fundamental life force among {{w|Algonquian peoples|Algonquian groups}}.
